fields.name: app.dashboard
fields.description: Dashboard shows the whats next for each employee. It fetches the important notification from all the other application the user have access to.

fields.name: app.users
fields.description: Search users, initiate IM and access their social profile

fields.name: sudo.manageUsers
fields.description: creat user, update master data including password resetting, profile editor, designation editor

fields.name: sudo.settings
fields.description: settings tab in the admin panel, if any of the configure.settings.[app] is assigned to this user this app is accesible to this user
